title: I Can't Play League Anymore "PVP.net Patcher has stopped working
body: So one day I was finished playing one of my other games when i decided to play League, I clicked the lol launcher and it said "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" I've already tried uninstalling it then reinstalling and it didn't work. I tried doing it a second time but searching through my computer for left over files thinking that was the problem, after i did that and reinstalled it, it still doesnt work. If anyone knows a way to fix this please tell me ASAP I need my daily league game!

replies.body: This error is super common when a security setting is getting in the way and blocking you.  Start off with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.
